info.description:
golfing  Flopine's [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/3slBDS[/url]  1279 chars.

could it be shorter ? :-)
info.name: ShATI-Ombre: golfed (412 chars)

renderpass.code:
// golfing Flopine's 1279 chars https://shadertoy.com/view/3slBDS

// --- now in obfuscated golfing phase ( more readable in versions below )

#define R      *= mat2( cos(  vec4(0,11,33,0)                               //
#define B(b,c) m = length( max( q = abs( P = mod(P+b, b+b) - b ) - c , Z ))  \
                 + min( s = max(q.x,max(q.y,q.z)), Z ) ,                     \
               m > d ? d=m,S=q-s : S//
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {
    float  d=1., m,s, Z=0.,                                                  \
    t = iTime -.785,
    a = sin(t);
    vec3 q,S, P = iResolution,
    p =  vec3( ( U+U - P.xy ) / P.y * ( sin(t-2.) < Z ? 2. : 9. ) , -20 );
    for ( ; ++O.a < 66. && d > .01 ; p.z += d )
        P = p,
        P.yz R-.62 )),
        P.xz R+.785)),   d = Z,
        B(  P  , 5. ),
        B( 2.5 , 2. ),
        B(  .25, .2 + a * sqrt( .02/a - .01 )   );
    d < .01 && S.x < Z ? O += S.z < Z ? 1. : .44 : O;
} /*





// --- 422 chars (from now getting a bit obfuscated )

#define R      mat2( cos(  vec4(0,11,33,0)                                  //
#define B(b,c) m = length( max( q = abs( P = mod(P -b, b+b) - b ) - c , 0.)) \
                 + min( s = max(q.x,max(q.y,q.z)), 0. ) ,                    \
               m > d ? d=m,Q=q,S=s : S//
#define mainImage( O, U )                                                    \
    float  d=1., m,s,S,                                                      \
    t = iTime -.785,                                                         \
    a = sin(t);                                                              \
    vec3 q,Q, P = iResolution,                                               \
    p =  vec3( ( U+U - P.xy ) / P.y * ( sin(t-2.) < 0. ? 2. : 9. ) , -20 );  \
    for ( ; ++O.a < 66. && d > .01 ; p.z += d )                              \
        P = p,                                                               \
        P.yz *= R-.62 )),                                                    \
        P.xz *= R+.785)),   d = 0.,                                          \
        B(  P  , 5.  ),                                                      \
        B( 2.5 , 2.  ),                                                      \
        B(  .25, .2 + .1 * a * sqrt( 2./abs(a) - 1. )   );                   \
    d < .01 && S > Q.x ? O += S > Q.z ? 1. : .44 : O                        /*





// --- 438 chars

#define r(a)   mat2( cos( a + vec4(0,11,33,0) ) )                           //
#define B(b,c) m = length( max( q = abs( P = mod(P -b, b+b) - b ) - c , 0.)) \
                 + min( s = max(q.x,max(q.y,q.z)), 0. ) ,                    \
               m > d ? d=m,Q=q,S=s : S                                      //
#define mainImage( O, U )                                                    \
    float  d=1., i=d, m,s,S,                                                 \
    t = iTime -.785,                                                         \
    a = sin(t);                                                              \
    vec3 q,Q, P = iResolution,                                               \
    p =  vec3( ( U+U - P.xy ) / P.y * ( sin(t-2.) < 0. ? 2. : 9. ) , -20 );  \
    for ( ; ++i < 66. && d > .01 ; p.z += d )                                \
        P = p,                                                               \
        P.yz *= r(-.62),                                                     \
        P.xz *= r(.785),   d = 0.,                                           \
        B(  P  , 5.  ),                                                      \
        B( 2.5 , 2.  ),                                                      \
        B(  .25, .2 + .1 * sign(a) * sqrt( abs(a+a) - a*a )   );             \
    d < .01 && S != Q.x ? O += S==Q.y ? 1. : .44 : O                        /*





// --- 504 chars

#define r(a)    mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                            //
#define B(p,c)  q = abs(p)-c,                                            \
                m = min(0.,s=max(q.x,max(q.y,q.z))) + length(max(q,0.)), \
                m>M? M=m,Q=q,S=s :S

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U )
{
    float  d=1., i=d,M,m,s,S,
    t = mod( iTime -.785, 6.283 ),
    a = sin( t );
    a = sign(a) * sqrt( abs(a+a) - a*a );
    vec3  q,Q,P,o, R = iResolution,
    p =  vec3( ( U+U - R.xy ) / R.y * mix(2.,9.,ceil(sin(t-2.))), -20 );
    
    for ( O-=O ; ++i<66. && d>.01 ; p.z += d = M )
        o = p,
        o.yz *= r(-.62),
        o.xz *= r(.785), M=0.,
        B( o , 5.),
        B( P = mod(o -2.5, 5.) - 2.5 , 2.      ),
        B(     mod(P-.25,  .5) - .25 , .2+a*.1 );

    d<.01 ? O +=  S==Q.x? 0. : S==Q.y? 1. : .44
          : O;
}

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
